short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Meet emoji tool, similar to Google's internal MeetMoji extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google has an internal Chrome extension called "MeetMoji", which my former department at Google used quite heavily.  It gives all meeting participants the ability to pop up emojis (and limited animations) on everyone else's screen.  Useful for consensus building, celebrating team milestones, or just entertainment.

Sadly, that extension is Google-internal-only, and as I recently left Google I wanted to re-build it.

I built this during the 2021 Opendoor Hackathon.
